What is required to create a currency with a specific name in Verus?
To create a currency with a specific name, you need an ID with the same name. The controller of this ID is the only one who can create a currency with that name, and they can only do so once.

What is the significance of controlling an ID with a specific name in Verus?

Controlling an ID with a specific name in Verus gives you the exclusive right to create a currency with that name. This means that if you control an ID like "gold@", you are the only one who can create a currency called "gold@".
